website_summaries.verdict: An impressive portable stapler that does a good job of staying free from jams.
pros: Ready to go right out of the box
Can be operated with batteries or AC cord
Can handle over two dozen sheets at a time
cons: This stapler can be a little louder than you might expect

customer_reviews.title: This is a 'handsome' stapler and perfect in our office setting
customer_reviews.text: This is a 'handsome' stapler and perfect in our office setting. I print a lot of documents and some of the larger SOW's (Statement of Work) need to be stapled and filed as a hard copy once signed, scanned and emailed back to the client. A normal stapler doesn't work on the thicker docs and paper clips get caught on other papers. This works perfectly for my needs. It has a sleek look which I like and is not industrial looking or bulky like the old-fashioned clunky ones. I have it on my desk using the power adapter and haven't tried with batteries, but I don't see any reason those wouldn't work just as well. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the stapler! it is light, reliable and can staple more pages than advertised. It goes smoothly and I don't have to struggle with it like with my previous one! I received promptly and the seller was friendly, knowledgeable and efficient. I strongly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: conanjose

customer_reviews.title: Was a 5 Star until is stopped working (after 2 years)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this electric stapler for the office. I'm the only one that uses it and it gets light use. I've had the stapler for two years and all was well. It was working when I left the office on Friday and it wasn't working on Monday morning. It's just 'dead' - it's plugged in, everything looks fine, it just no longer works. I think a two year life-span for something lightly used, that costs as much as this one does is NOT GOOD VALUE. I liked it while it worked, but I will certainly not be spending this kind of money for another one with a two-year life expectancy. So disappointed . . .
customer_reviews.author: Triple L

customer_reviews.title: I love my Electric stapler
customer_reviews.text: I love my Electric stapler!! It so easy to use. you can plug it in or put batteries in it either way it can staple through heavy card board to 12 pieces of paper easily. I wished I had this product in college trying to staple papers and reports together would had been a cinch for this Electric stapler. I would recommend this for grade school children that have projects to high school and college or even a small business. This product works all you have to do is try it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my stapler
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stapler. The unit is strong in that it can staple 20 pages without a problem. I purchased two of these staplers as we have to staple hundred of outlines, tests and CD sleeve every week. We have a school, Slidell Baptist Seminary and because our seminary is correspondence, we have to staple just about everything. I have never seen a stapler like this one. It is the BEST! I am so glad that I found it. I, without hesitation give this stapler, 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dabdoub

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy has been very impressive. I needed a stapler to replace my Industrial grade Swingline 51110. Everything comparable to this older model had terrible reviews and the throat depth was too shallow. I decided to give this one a go, and it has surpassed expectations. I use the stapler everyday and I staple up to 500 fabric swatches to cardstock each day. I did have to tape this little one down to the table so it didn't slide, but so far it has not buckled under pressure. I'm hoping another Heavy Duty or Industrial grade stapler comes out that gets better consumer reviews, but until then, I'll keep buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Humble and Efficient litte machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy,..every night I need to staple around 1250 pages in stacks of 5 or 6 depending,...in a relatively quiet office. I have tried 4 or 5 different staplers, from electric to "power assisted" and this is by far my favorite. it is very stable, easy to fill, QUIET, especially compared to the others that sometimes sound like a gunshot..great price, too...I paid around $20..about half the price of many of its competitors ...I would recommend this stapler to anyone
customer_reviews.author: pennypincher

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd stapler I bought. The first two were horrible and I sent them back. This stapler couldnt operate better and the price is beyond reasonable. The first two I bought were in the same pricr range and they were junk. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Litchfield

customer_reviews.title: Best Electric Stapler!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! Just what I was looking for to replace my older SwingLine version, which was not AC and Battery powered like this one. The SwingLine just started giving me battery failure flashing red lights all the time. The batteries were replaced but still happened. Seems the connectors hot loose somehow and even though I tried fixing it, same thing happened. I tossed when I ordered this one. This one is streamlined and glossy looking and its as beautiful as a battery operated stapler can get! Works powerfully and perfectly. You can set the depth of the staple, and that feature stays in place very securely. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent.P

customer_reviews.title: Very good product; outstanding service
customer_reviews.text: The product is good, does what is supposed to do and very robust. I was having trouble with adjustment and emailed the OfficeGoods help desk for advice. Lesly was terrific and after the advice worked I was happy I didn't have to take her up on the immediate offer to replace if needed. That's what is called service, folks! A big item or a simple stapler makes no difference. It just makes the day better.
customer_reviews.author: john emery

customer_reviews.title: Office Goods was good on their word
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: Office Products saw my one-star review and sent me a new stapler which is working great. Nice to have honest people to work with. First Review:I took this thing to work so it wouldn't disappear on my desk. It worked a couple times then jammed and every time I tried to use it it squealed and loudly! Great for annoying my co-workers. I may be able to adjust it if I can find the instructions. I get tired of fixing new stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Joanie K. Cheverez

customer_reviews.title: great office stapler
customer_reviews.text: I have used this stapler for a while and I always had trouble getting the refill drawer to open fully. I finally read the review and said to give a good tug and I did and it works... full load of staples went in.... This is the best stapler that I have ever used in my many years of putting papers together..... Thank you OFFICE GOODS.
customer_reviews.author: Stella F. Parker

customer_reviews.title: This stapler was so easy to use right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This stapler was so easy to use right out of the box .It was a splurge for me to try an electric stapler. It was a real joy to have a new automatic stapler which I didn't really think about buying until I had a lot of reorganizing and sorting out an office to make room for a studio. I love that you can adjust the slide when easy. This is also a new feature that I have never had before. It is not bulky and is easy to transport around the house. It also goes thru thick papers that I use at times. The staples don't bend or go in just half way. Say goodbye to paper clips!
customer_reviews.author: K.R. Demosthenes

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: When it worked it was good; stapled pages efficiently and did not jam. However, the slide drawer (for the staples) was always a problem. The button at the back did not easily eject the slide forward so you could add staples and pushing slide back to closed position was difficult. After 13 months the slide refused to be push back into the body. I got the slide pushed forward but will not close with staples. Unusable now. Will buy a different brand this time.
customer_reviews.author: Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great Stapler!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was hesitant because the Liberty stapler only used strips of staples whereas my old stapler used cartridges of 500 staples that lasted forever. That said, something must have been changed in manufacturing because the cartridges no longer dispense staples so I was forced to try something new. Glad I did. My new stapler is much smaller so takes up less desk space. It also uses batteries which makes it portable, which is a great feature. I would definitely recommend this stapler.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Lasted ONE year
customer_reviews.text: This product started acting up months into my purchase (of course, after the return period) but I was able to reload the staples by pushing hard (because it would no longer "pop" out). NOW, the chamber doesn't even close, making the entire stapler unusable. I wouldn't re-buy this, expecting the same thing to happen...too bad, the convenience was good for a couple of months anyway.
customer_reviews.author: OnlinePhenom

customer_reviews.title: No Jams!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I bought this to replace a pathetic battery operated stapler from Swingline. This is a far superior stapler, no jams (NO JAMS), responsive, and it isn't draining my batteries quickly. Did you hear me....no jams?? Not a s.i.n.g.l.e. jam! This is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: DonForSan

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: This stapler has made my job easier. I staple a lot during when doing my accounts payable and I just love that sound when it staples. It is battery powered but also has cord so you can plug it into an outlet. I was so excited when I started using this stapler, I bought one for my sister. She is just as pleased :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's proven to be very reliable
customer_reviews.text: It gives you the option to run it using either the detachable electrical cord or just run it off the batteries which is what I chose to do. I've had it for a while and there have been no jammed staples. I also like the fact that you can adjust the position of the staples on the paper by simply moving a slide mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This compact, sleek electric stapler does the job well! Thanks to another reviewer, I was prepared when the staple refill arm seemed to get stuck. A little brute force gets it out with no problem. It has only gotten stuck once, so this is not a frequent issue. For the price, the inconvenience is worth it for such a great little stapler.
customer_reviews.author: DMFOhio

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Lasted exactly one year. Although it worked well when it was new, it died after one year of very light use. I had to replace it and went with a different model. Hopefully the new one will last more than one year.
customer_reviews.author: Polymath

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This was the third of three electric staplers I purchased. The first two each had problems and had to be returned. This one is very well designed and work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great stapler.  I recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stapler for my husband to use at his office. I decided to try it out first. When I opened the box, I was impressed with how attractive and compact it is. I plugged it in and easily stapled four pages. Great stapler - it's powerful and worked perfectly right out of the box! It's lightweight but not wobbly and it's easy to use, and can work for home or office. Hmm I might just keep it for myself...
customer_reviews.author: Philly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work switched staples worked briefly for about 15 staples ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work switched staples worked briefly for about 15 staples stopped again kept jamming up. I was only trying 2 sheets. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetbaskets

customer_reviews.title: No more staple struggles!
customer_reviews.text: This stapler is so reliable and so easy to use. I wasn't sure I wanted to spend a lot of money on a stapler but I have a feeling this one will be around long enough to easily justify its cost. No staple jams, no struggling with staples that don't penetrate far enough into the paper stack, and it is so easily adjustable that it would be impossible to not get staples lined up when trying to bind papers along the edge and not just in the corner. I'm very happy with this purchase - and so are my kids!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence L.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for my needs. I do a lot of stapling and this really saves me time and hand cramps. I do about 3-8 pages a time without issues. I like that I can do either battery or wall plug. Makes it more diverse on were it sits on my desk
customer_reviews.author: alleykatmom

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that it works great without needing to ...
customer_reviews.text: Our stapler broke at the office and we decided to get an electric stapler. We took a chance on this one and it is working very well. It is battery operated and small enough to move around the office which is a plus. I like the fact that it works great without needing to be plugged in. It was a good purchase and not too expensive. Glad we tried it.
customer_reviews.author: Remery

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this stapler is great! It does just what it’s advertised to do and works beautifully. I bought it for home. I was diagnosed with rheumatoid arthritis a couple of years ago, so this is actually a good adaptive tool. Less stress on the joints! As with most things, time will tell more about the quality of this stapler. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: jbree5

customer_reviews.title: Best Stapler I Ever Used!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a number electric staplers which were ok but footprint was large and didn't look good on my desk. The OfficeGoods Liberty Pro 25 is a third the size of my last stapler, light weight, easy to carry to another room or on a trip with batteries installed. The batteries also allow to alleviate having another wire on your desk. An did I mention their great customer service responds very quickly if you have any questions about their products? You want go wrong buying this or other products from OfficeGoods.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: One of my Favorite office supplies
customer_reviews.text: This one is for the gadge girls and guys who love great office products. It’s easy to load. Uses batteries... which makes it portable, yet has a wire, In case you need one. Powerful stapler that has maybe jammed once (operator error). Staples about 25 pages easily. Sturdy and secure. You’ll love it. I do!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Stapler Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best stapler ever! I've been using my new electric stapler for a couple of months now and absolutely love it. It is so easy to use and never misses, never jams and is easy to refill. I couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: Better than expecations.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stapler! So convenient to have on my desk! Been using standard stapler for my entire life and to have an electric one is such a pleasure. Definitely something every household, office or student should have. And this thoughtful seller even had it preloaded with staples so I was able to use immediately out of the package without having to hunt for staples or make a seperate trip to the store! I am sure i will keep this handy little thing near me at all times!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Scott

customer_reviews.title: I loves it so much I ended up buying a second one.
customer_reviews.text: This stapler is great! I love it so much that I ended up buying a second one. It works well and is dependable. It also goes thru thick stacks of paper far better than all of the name brand staplers I've used in the past. I can't do without it in the office!
customer_reviews.author: Doctor OTJedi

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these about a year ago. IT works great with batteries. But the power will diminish over time as batteries weaken. If your desk is by an outlet I suggest use the cord. We use it a lot in the office. So far it's working great.
customer_reviews.author: Sarik K.

customer_reviews.title: Love love LOVE this little thing
customer_reviews.text: Use it at work and it gets put to work. Sometimes I have loads of 150-200 packets and this thing handles them like a champ. So glad I got it; saved my wrist from a traditional stapler!
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I own many electric staplers and this one is my favorite. It works perfectly and can quickly be adjusted to move the applied staple to different parts of the edge of the pages.
customer_reviews.author: J. Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my wife. She loves this stapler. Simple to to setup and it has a small footprint in her desk. It uses regular staples which is great. All you do is load the stapler, set your depth and you’re off and running.
customer_reviews.author: Rio

customer_reviews.title: I Love My Electric Stapler
customer_reviews.text: I love this electric stapler! I work in the entertainment industry and constantly working with scenes that need to be stapled quickly. This stapler is a dream and even better than I expected. It works so fast and efficiently, it makes anything else seem archaic. I'm going to give it for holiday gifts, people will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette M.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable stapler
customer_reviews.text: I liked being able to use battery and plug in options. Works great - no problems. Same weight as most.
customer_reviews.author: Lavonne Halby

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed for sure.
customer_reviews.text: I used it in office. Note past tense. I knocked it off and now I’m looking fo a stapler.
customer_reviews.author: Rese

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best price with 100% guarantee! Just got it and seems to work well. I’m very happy to have found this item. Best Buy! Highly recommended. So I did have an issue but customer service was awesome and now I have two!
customer_reviews.author: Cs

customer_reviews.title: The customer service with this company is amazing! I ended up getting another stapler and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stapler and it conked out after two weeks. But... The customer service with this company is amazing! I ended up getting another stapler and it's working like a champ! Works really well with batteries.
customer_reviews.author: callmetaj

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This stapler lives up to its name. It is easy to use, and what I really like is that you can adjust where the staple goes to exactly where you want it. It even came with staples pre-loaded. It hasn't jammed and is light enough to travel with. You can work just about anywhere because it's a travel friendly size, You can plug it in or add batteries. And so easy to use, just slide in up to 25 sheets and it does all the work.
customer_reviews.author: Will Southard

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected, which is great. I'm pleasantly surprised at how great this thing works too. Staples many sheets with ease
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: i love this stapler
customer_reviews.text: i love this stapler! its small and compact, and not noisy like some can be. i have purchased several, and even sent one to a collegue in another office.. she loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: chrisr

customer_reviews.title: Takes little room , For doing a big job.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very powerful for being so small in stature , One main feature I really like I can guide the length that this table goes in the paper from the very top to over an inch.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Use it every day
customer_reviews.text: I love this and use it at work daily. I wish it stapled slightly thicker stacks, though.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Mischka

customer_reviews.title: Good for home office.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good electric stapler for the home office. Doesn't take much room on the desk. Saves my hands from having to use pressure like the manual stapler.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Once in a while I had to insert pages two or three times to get it to staple, but I'm thinking I must not be hitting the correct spot when it doesn't staple.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great stapler...using the battery option and very powerful and a small footprint on the desk. Heavy enough to be stable without holding it yet easy to move. Great customer service...had a question and it was answered within an hour. And the fact it uses standard staples is another plus.
customer_reviews.author: DrBobSac

customer_reviews.title: Great Stapler!
customer_reviews.text: What a great find! This Electric Stapler is a life saver! I use it every day, I have had it for a couple of years and it is still functioning like new. I love that is portable because it works great on batteries too. Great Quality!
customer_reviews.author: Terri N.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stapler
customer_reviews.text: It is an excellent stapler, and an excellent size for small spaces
customer_reviews.author: Norma Diana

customer_reviews.title: It makes you office feel like a spa....just kidding. It is fun to use.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in my office loves this stapler. The line is too long now, so I may have to buy another one for my room. Seriously, the customer service is fantastic. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: FAST
customer_reviews.text: fast, I had another brand that took about 5 sec to staple and then kept giving jammed, this is about 1 sec and not 1 jam yet.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma

customer_reviews.title: This stapler is great.
customer_reviews.text: The stapler is great. It is a lot quitter than the one I had previously and it fits nicer on my desk. In addition, I like how you can adjust where it staples onto the document.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace one from years ago. I have been doing my taxes, and had so many receipts to staple. I just had hand surgery, so can't use a manual stapler. Love these.
customer_reviews.author: Diana T.

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: bought this for home office and it works great! very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Y. Hensley

customer_reviews.title: This has turned out to be a very good stapler, the first one received didn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: This has turned out to be a very good stapler, the first one received didn’t work well, we returned it and were contacted to see if we would try another one. We did and the second one worked great and now we have purchased another one. Great customer support and we would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Best stapler ever
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It’s battery operated so it can be picked up to staple papers instead of having to stay on counter because it’s tethered with a chord. Light weight and staples through many papers easily and securely.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Portability
customer_reviews.text: The original purchase was defective and was contacted immediately by the vendor and a replacement was sent. This is my second purchase and the main reason for my selection of this item was that I was able to take it anywhere to work. It was light weight and battery operated.
customer_reviews.author: Pat P.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: The stapler is awesome. I have an animal clinic and we needed a new electric stapler and this one is working very well. I like that is can also be run on batteries, that is a big plus as it is one less cord to deal with. The office manager is very happy with it and how well it is working. I never thought an electric stapler would make the office a more efficient place but it did. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first month - very unhappy with the way advertised
customer_reviews.author: Edward F. Watts, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great. Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stapler to staple a folded-over thick paper item label onto a poly bag. Used about 1000 staples and it worked perfectly. It's quiet, fast, and never jammed. Perfect for my project. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife likes stapler so much its like not having yo push down on it
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes stapler so much its like not having yo push down on it .The stapler is a great tool. Thank You Peter p Mignone
customer_reviews.author: PETER  P MIGNONE

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for several weeks, then worked intermittenty, now not at all (neither new battery or electric).
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte V

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My middle school students are fascinated by this stapler. It's holding up well with repeated usage.
customer_reviews.author: Puttie Cat

customer_reviews.title: Product not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This states that the stapler will work up to 25 pages. The Office Goods electric stapler can't even staple 5 pages without it jamming. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Johnsen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Electric Stapler, it is a great size, the adjustment ability is nice, and it really does staple many pages with no problem! Thank you for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Louder Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought due to the high reviews. When using for the first time, it was much louder than expected and could hear the spring vibrate. We are in a fairly small office and was afraid the noise would bother the others. Stapled okay but am looking for a quieter stapler.
customer_reviews.author: Stitch

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, slim, portable
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stapler. I has an adjustable depth stop, it doesn't jam and will staple several sheets of paper. It is compact and easily picked up and used like a manual stapler. For me, this was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Posey

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: I returned this horrible item the day after I got it. It was loud, did not staple properly, and jammed repeatedly. Either it's just poorly made or I got a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I researched and researched. This one made the most sense to buy after considering cost and reviews. It has been fantastic. I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Portability
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a portable battery operated stapler that could handle at least 20 pages. This stapler went through 24 pages like it was butter. Great design, not too bulky; I needed portability. This stapler met and exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S. Wright, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, quick and efficent
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the girls on the line to seal component envelopes. No complaints since
customer_reviews.author: Big Mel

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Hi, the electric stapler is working perfectly!!!! I'm very happy with this purchase. I've always had lots of trouble with the standard stapler machines; I guess I'm too rough and I always end up breaking them. I sure hope that this one will last in my hands!!!​
customer_reviews.author: Irma N Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Really good stapler for a really good price!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly just as advertised. Would definitely recommend to top friends and anyone needing an affordable, portable, dependability stapler!
customer_reviews.author: Kenya a faithful Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superior customer service
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with first one and got superior customer service from the company. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MES

customer_reviews.title: Have had for a few mo this and works great. I do a lot of stapling for home ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had for a few mo this and works great. I do a lot of stapling for home office and staples at least 15 sheets at a time good
customer_reviews.author: P. JOB

customer_reviews.title: Great stapler
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy a "no name" stapler, but this has been a pleasant surprise. Works perfectly. No jams. Relatively quiet (as far as electric staplers go). Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Small, light weight, does everything my larger more ...
customer_reviews.text: Small, light weight, does everything my larger more expensive one did. And it seems to recognize the inserted papers more quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, not too loud and takes regular staples. Bought it for work and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Molmag

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one has now failed after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: 1st one did not work, was replaced in a timely 2nd one jammed and cannot be cleared. Amazon returns are only allowed for the first 30 days. Cannot find manufacturer on line to exercise warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Flying Jib

customer_reviews.title: The stapler is AWESOME. I did 700 copies last week and my ...
customer_reviews.text: The stapler is AWESOME. I did 700 copies last week and my hands weren't sore for pounding a traditional stapler. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Caspian

customer_reviews.title: We are definitely satisfied with the stapler
customer_reviews.text: We are definitely satisfied with the stapler. We actually previously purchased a different brand-name electric stapler and it jammed on the first use. After returning it, we decided to try this stapler, and are very happy we did.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Bilderback

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for my office
customer_reviews.text: I thought this stapler would be bulky on my desk, but it fits well alongside my telephone. It staples 25 pages just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Na. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great stapler
customer_reviews.text: So much nicer than the last stapler I bought, does not jam either
customer_reviews.author: angela vess

customer_reviews.title: Low quality and lacks durability
customer_reviews.text: Very little use, maybe a hundred staples. Had for a few months and then it just stopped. Tried things others suggested, didn't work. Now its a paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Michael DeWeese

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and it does not get up and walk away like the manual stapler.
customer_reviews.author: E. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STAPLER
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE MY NEW ELECTRIC STAPLER. GETS THE JOB DONE FAST AND EASY. WOULD BUY AGAIN AND RECOMMEND TO FAMILY AND FRIENDS.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lambrakis

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working 3 days after return eligibility expired!
customer_reviews.text: Worked for for a month. Now, works sometimes, not others! I cannot return it since it stopped 3 days after my return eligibility expired!
customer_reviews.author: LoveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile in terms of adjusting to meet your need
customer_reviews.author: J. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great electric stapler!
customer_reviews.text: I use this stapler at work, stapling travel vouchers to claim forms 5 day a week, and it has saved my arms and hands.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas girl

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. I wish it would staple 20+ pages, but it won't.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Zakada

customer_reviews.title: The favorite item on my desk
customer_reviews.text: The favorite item on my desk. Love, love, love it. Can't recommend it more highly.
customer_reviews.author: viverino

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Stapler
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for made very well. I'm using it in battery mode and it works great. So impressed I just bought one for my wife. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lee Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Best stapler!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stapler I've ever owned. I had to do a project for work that required stapling tons of copies of paper. The stapler was so easy to use and I got it done in half the time. You just slide the papers in and it staples. No jamming, no effort.
customer_reviews.author: LoveToPaint

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty stapler but it is SO LOUD it's startling.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne C. Mayner

customer_reviews.title: I love this stapler
customer_reviews.text: I love this stapler! It is small but mighty! I have already stapled 25 to 30 pages without a hitch! I also like the fact that you can use batteries instead of the power cord. I hate wires everywhere. I highly recommend ths stapler.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Kavounas

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this stapler. I do a lot of stapling and this has taken the stress out of it for my joints. I just wish I had purchased it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Greene

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: No problems so far. Holds an entire row of staples - some do not, which irritates me. Easy to operate, does not jam.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Harms

product_meta.title: OfficeGoods Electric and Battery Operated Stapler - Liberty Pro 25 – Jam Free, Heavy Duty, Compact & Portable with a 25 Sheet Stapling Capacity for Your Home & Office Supplies
feature_bullets: JAM FREE AT LAST: Get excellent performance from the Liberty Pro 25 electric stapler. An integral piece in your office desk accessories that has a jam free mechanism that ensures stapling without interruption. Special care has been taken in manufacturing the stapler with premium eco-friendly materials to ensure smooth consistent stapling. Uses standard size staples.

DEPENDABLE & STURDY: This compact workhorse fits any desk whether big or small, giving the needed power to get your work done fast & efficiently. Repetitive stapling will be a breeze! The stapler delivers fast stapling just how you like it. We guarantee a great experience when using the Liberty Pro.

READY TO GO TO WORK: The stapler comes with a full strip of standard staples already loaded so you can get to work immediately. Use it for any desktop whether it's used as school office supplies, in an executive office, or in a home office. The stapler works with the AC Adapter that is included or 6 AA batteries (not included).

PREMIUM STAPLING GUIDE: With the staple depth adjuster you can place the staple exactly where you need it. The staple guide can be adjusted by 1/10 inch intervals between .25 inches and 1.5 inches giving 14 positions to choose from. Staples 2 to 25 sheets of 20 lb. paper with ease consistently.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: OfficeGoods offers a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If there is anything non-optimum with your order, let us know and we'll provide a refund or replacement. Hassle free and no questions asked.
